channel.title: Nividia Re-Release!
channel.description:
I am releasing this again because I removed it off Moparscape long ago.
[SIZE="4"]Leave some feedback before you download, it is respectful. Since this is the only 317 with Dungeoneering I Believe! [/size] [b]Client Version: 7[/b]
Server Download: [url=http://uppit.com/h5zwz0ycnxq6/Server.rar]Click Here Please[/url]
[url=http://uppit.com/jdx33rxu1yp2/Nividia.rar][img]http://i55.tinypic.com/f4ib14.gif[/img] [b]Click the banner above to download the Nividia client. [/b][/url]
Open Client.Java Search for....
[code]server = "Ip Over Here"[/code]
[SIZE="4"][COLOR="Red"]Dungeoneering and Stat![/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2najtwp.jpg[/img]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110206194103/runescape/images/1/19/Primal_2h_weilded.png[/img]
[img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/6250/primal2.png[/img]
[font=Impact][size=20pt][b]Information![/b][/size][/font]
- Random Events Added - Clue Scrolls Added - 99.9% PVP - Bounty Item PVP Areas Added - Fun PK Added - Recipe For Disaster Quest Added - Giant Mole Added - Zombie Minigame In Process
[size=20pt][b] Clue Scrolls![/b][/size]
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/mkj381.jpg[/img]
[b][size=20pt]PVP[/size][/b] [img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/1017/2hell5l.png[/img] [img]http://oi52.tinypic.com/33y6rur.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi51.tinypic.com/alg7zo.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi54.tinypic.com/2dgrl10.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi54.tinypic.com/2ngbggj.jpg[/img] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/24xi3q1.gif[/img] [img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/9118/70399430.png[/img]
[b][size=20pt]Other[/size][/b] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/34ypk6a.jpg[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/21dpwgo.jpg[/img] [img]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/2879/specsc.png[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2lwpqvm.jpg[/img][/ur]
